com.skobbler.ngx.tile

Class SKTileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.tile.SKTileManager

  • public final class SKTileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles tile operations.
    Version:
    2.4

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SKTileManager getInstance()
        Creates a single instance of SKTileManager
        Returns:
        a single instance of SKTileManager

      • getTilesInBoundingBox

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTilesInBoundingBox(int tileType,
                                                     int minX,
                                                     int minY,
                                                     int maxX,
                                                     int maxY,
                                                     SKTileManager.SKOperationType operationType,
                                                     int versionIndex,
                                                     byte fc)
        Retrieves tiles of a specific type from a given bounding box
        Parameters:
        tileType - type of tile . See SKTileManager.SKTileType
        minX - bounding box minX
        minY - bounding box minY
        maxX - bounding box maxX
        maxY - bounding box maxY
        operationType - See SKTileManager.SKOperationType
        versionIndex - version index
        fc - parameter used only in case of Roads and operation eOpExist
        Returns:
        path to the tiles in the bounding box

      • getSpecificTile

        public SKTileContent getSpecificTile(SKTileManager.SKTileType tileType,
                            int id,
                            SKTileManager.SKOperationType operationType,
                            int versionIndex,
                            boolean withContent)
        Retrieves a specific tile from the SKM packages installed
        Parameters:
        tileType - . See SKTileManager.SKTileType
        id - tile id
        operationType - (0: enumerate all tiles, 1: enumerate all tiles and start downloading tiles that are not downloaded, 2: enumerate downloaded tiles, 3: enumerate tiles that have not been downloaded)
        versionIndex - version index
        withContent - if true the content will also be returned
        Returns:
        an object containing the path to the tile and the tile content

      • getExistingTilePercentage

        public float getExistingTilePercentage(double longitude,
                              double latitude,
                              int radius,
                              int flags)
        Check how many tiles exist as percentage around a position
        Parameters:
        longitude - longitude of the position
        latitude - latitude of the position
        radius - in meters around the position
        flags - 1: search for POIs, 2: search for streets, 3: search for both POIs and streets
        Returns:
        existing tiles percentage

      • getTextTileForRoadTile

        public java.lang.String getTextTileForRoadTile(int id,
                                      SKTileManager.SKOperationType operationType,
                                      int versionIndex)
        Retrieves text tiles for specific road tile.
        Parameters:
        id - tile id
        operationType - (0: enumerate all tiles, 1: enumerate all tiles and start downloading tiles that are not downloaded, 2: enumerate downloaded tiles, 3: enumerate tiles that have not been downloaded)
        versionIndex - version index
        Returns:
        path to the text tile if it exist.
